title: Loans from small time borrowers surge post COVID: Report
description: The report by CRIF Highmark provides insights into the portfolio at risk across various buckets. It ranges from 0.3% to 2.1% as of June 2023. The report also highlights that delinquency has improved across all individual MSME loans, except for construction equipment loans, where payments are due between 181-360 days. These findings assume significance in understanding the risk and performance of different loan segments.
